docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 9 -- A plea for guarantees for small States to be incorporated in the world-wide security organization projected at the Dumbarton Oaks Conference was made in a proposal submitted on behalf of Uruguay today, when Edward R. Stettinius...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 9 -- A plea for guarantees for small States to be incorporated in the world-wide security organization projected at the Dumbarton Oaks Conference was made in a proposal submitted on behalf of Uruguay today, when Edward R. Stettinius Jr., Acting Secretary of State, discussed the proposed organization with Ambassadors of the Latin-American republics.
docs.abstract: Stettinius conf with Amer nations Ambs on small nations roles in proposed plan; Uruguay urges specific guarantees for small nations; suggests revamping of old league unless Dumbarton plan offers safeguards

headline.main: URUGUAY SUGGESTS REVAMPING LEAGUE; Revival of Old Organization Urged Unless Oaks Plan Offers Safeguards

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 16 -- The Soviet Union desires peaceful relations with all nations regardless of their political systems and has no desire to intervene in their internal affairs, a spokesman says in an official publication.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 16 -- The Soviet Union desires peaceful relations with all nations regardless of their political systems and has no desire to intervene in their internal affairs, a spokesman says in an official publication.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, Nov. 20 -- Argentine Foreign Ministry officials frankly admit that the latest news from Washington and the other American capitals does not hold much promise for a meeting of Foreign Ministers in the form proposed by Argentina.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 24 (U.P.) -- The divergent tendencies shown by Argentina on continental solidarity since the Rio de Janeiro conference early in 1942 has "finally brought about the definite separation of that Government from other * * *...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 24 (U.P.) -- The divergent tendencies shown by Argentina on continental solidarity since the Rio de Janeiro conference early in 1942 has "finally brought about the definite separation of that Government from other * * * American nations,'' according to a report sent American Governments today by the Inter-American Committee for the Political Defense of the Hemisphere.

docs.lead_paragraph: A 12-CENTAVOS brown postage and a 25c green air-mail received from Mexico by Leon Monosson commemorate (as inscribed on the 25c) the "III Feria del Libro y Exposicion Nacional del Periodismo y de Cine y Radio" (Third Book Fair and National Exposition of Periodicals, the Cinema and Radio) held in October.

docs.snippet: CHICAGO, Nov. 27 -- Overwhelming support of the American as against the British proposal on the "fifth freedom" of the air was indicated today at the International Civil Aviation Conference in a debate in which twenty countries, besides the United...
docs.lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, Nov. 27 -- Overwhelming support of the American as against the British proposal on the "fifth freedom" of the air was indicated today at the International Civil Aviation Conference in a debate in which twenty countries, besides the United States, Britain and Canada, took part.

headline.main: AIR PARLEY DEBATE SUPPORTS U.S. PLAN; 14 of 20 Countries Taking Part Accept 5th Freedom -- Canada Offers New Compromise

docs.snippet: Strong faith in the "unity of the Americas," which he believes will be a "constructive aid to the organization of the peace" was expressed yesterday by Juan Carlos Blanco, Uruguay's Ambassador to the United States, when interviewed in his suite at...
docs.lead_paragraph: Strong faith in the "unity of the Americas," which he believes will be a "constructive aid to the organization of the peace" was expressed yesterday by Juan Carlos Blanco, Uruguay's Ambassador to the United States, when interviewed in his suite at the Waldorf-Astoria Hotel.
docs.abstract: DUMBARTON PEACE PLAN: Uruguay Amb to US, J C Blanco, foresees unity
